text: thai thirunaal festivities:The 4-day-long Pongal festival is being celebrated with zeal. People gather around a bonfire on the morning of Bhogi festival at Velapadi near Vellore; the last minute shoppers throng Long Bazzar and police personnel keep a tight vigil on the crowd in markets on Thursday. Colourfully decorated pots arrive for sale to kick-start the main celebrations.— Photos: C. Venkatachalapathy
title: Rejoicing a good harvest
